gnomeR 1.1.1.9000

Reference

All functions

CNregions.mod()

CNregions.mod Modified CNregions function from the facets package to handle small sample sizes.

add.perc()

Add a percentage to counts

add_pathways()

Pathway Alterations

annotate_any_panel()

Annotate Missing Gene Values According to Specific Panels

annotate_specific_panel()

Utility function to insert NA's According to Panel

clin.patients

An example of clinical patient level information file from IMPACT cbioPortal dataset.

clin.sample

An example of clinical sample level information file from IMPACT cbioPortal dataset.

cna

An example IMPACT cBioPortal mutation data set in API format

consequence_map

Consequence Map

create_gene_binary()

Enables creation of a binary matrix from a mutation file with a predefined list of samples (rows are samples and columns are genes)

curated_genes

List of curated genes for IMPACT oncoKB annotation.

.cna_gene_binary()

Make Binary Matrix From CNA data frame

.fusions_gene_binary()

Make Binary Matrix From Fusion data frame

.mutations_gene_binary()

Make Binary Matrix From Mutation data frame

.sum_alts_in_pathway()

Sum Alterations in a Pathway

facets_dat()

facets_dat

facets_heatmap()

facets_heatmap

gene_panels

Public Gene Panels on cBioPortal

genie_gene_info

GENIE consortium Gene Meta Data

ggcomut()

Comutation Heatmap of the Top Altered Genes

gggenecor()

Correlation Heatmap of the Top Altered Genes

ggsamplevar()

Histogram of Variants Per Sample Colored By Variant Classification

ggtopgenes()

Barplot of Most Frequently Altered Genes

ggvarclass()

Barplot of Variant Classification Counts

ggvartype()

Barplot of Variant Type Counts

gnomer_colors

List of suggested color palettes for when you need a large palette

gnomer_cols()

Function to extract colors from gnomer_colors as hex codes

gnomer_pal()

Return function to interpolate a gnomeR color palette

gnomer_palette()

Access the colors in a gnomeR color palette

gnomer_palettes

Complete list of gnomeR color palettes

impact_alias_table

IMPACT Alias Tables

impact_gene_info

IMPACT Gene Meta Data

mutation_viz()

Creates a set of plot summarising a mutation file.

mutations

An example IMPACT cBioPortal mutation data set in API format

names_df

Data Frame of Column Names

panel_names

GENIE panel names as found in synapse data

pathways

IMPACT Gene Pathways

pivot_cna_longer()

Reformat Wide CNA Data to Long

recode_alias()

Recode Hugo Symbol Column

reformat_cna()

Reformat CNA from maf (long) version to wide version

rename_columns()

Rename columns from API results to work with gnomeR functions

resolve_alias()

Resolve Hugo Symbol Names with Aliases

sanitize_cna_input()

Check CNA data frame to ensure columns are correct

sanitize_fusion_input()

Check fusion data frame to ensure columns are correct

sanitize_mutation_input()

Checks MAF input to ensure column names are correct and renamed genes are corrected

scale_color_pancan()

Color scale creator to add gnomeR colors in ggplot

scale_fill_pancan()

Fill scale creator to add gnomeR colors in ggplot

seg

A segmentation file from the cbioPortal datasets

specify_impact_panels()

IMPACT Panel Annotation of NA's

substrRight()

Utility Function to Extract SNV

summarize_by_gene()

Simplify binary matrix to one column per gene that counts any alteration type as 1

sv

An example IMPACT cBioPortal mutation data set in API format

tbl_genomic()

tbl_genomic

tcga_genes

A vector of 19441 hugo symbols in TCGA

tcga_samples

Data frame of all TCGA sample ids and their corresponding cancer type

ti_341

Intervals sequenced in 341 panel

ti_410

Intervals sequenced in 410 panel

ti_468

Intervals sequenced in 468 panel

which_impact_panel()

provide a list of impact panels a provided gene is found within
